plot: Former CIA Director Allen Dulles on April 13, 1953 heads the covert human research program called MK Ultra. Several extremist group members/leaders under illegal drugs are linked to the MK Ultra program & atrocious acts of violence.
title: America's Dark Secrets Documentary
